snippet: The initial report about the possible causes of the accident compiled by investigators said that the fire in the mine was not caused by a transformer explosion as originally suggested but by smoldering coal that ignited.
abstract: Turkish authorities, prompted by public anger in response to country's worst mining accident, detain 25 people and arrest at least three mining company executives after initial investigation suggests that company failed to heed safety warnings.
lead_paragraph: The initial report about the possible causes of the accident compiled by investigators said that the fire in the mine was not caused by a transformer explosion as originally suggested but by smoldering coal that ignited.

headline.main: Turkey Arrests Several Executives Over Mining Disaster
headline.print_headline: Turkey Arrests Several Executives Over Mining Disaster
